title: GoI Formats
content:
[[module CSS]]
#page-content #toc {
    max-width: 18.25rem;
}
#toc-list div[style="margin-left: 2em;"] {
    font-size: 96.5%;
}
@media only screen and (max-width: 640px) {
    #page-content #toc.floatright {
        max-width: 90%;
        float: none;
        margin: 1rem auto;
    }
}
[[/module]]

[[div class="content-panel standalone series"]]

[[f>toc]]

[[# info]]
+ Information

This is a listing of all GoI Format documents, organized alphabetically by Group of Interest. Groups without a document format are not listed on this page. They may be added if a format for them becomes available.

GoI Formats are documents written from the perspective of a specific Group of Interest, who each approach the anomalous in their own unique way. You can think of these articles as another organisation's version of the SCP Format, reflecting their own priorities and interests. 

**[[[groups-of-interest |More information on the Groups of Interest can be found here.]]]**

Where possible, the hub page for each Group of Interest has been linked. These hubs contain further information about that GoI, as well as instructions on how to use their format.

[[[goi-formats-audio-edition| Audio Readings of GoI Formats can be found here.]]]

~~~~
